text.name: info1
text.text: While arcade boards have traditionally been custom

text.name: info2
text.text: designs, there have been a number of systems that

text.name: info3
text.text: were instead based on home console platforms.

text.name: info4
text.text: The first such board was the Nintendo VS. System,

text.name: info5
text.text: based on the Famicom and released in 1984. The last

text.name: info6
text.text: console-based board was Namco System 369 which was

text.name: info7
text.text: released in 2011 and based on the Sony PlayStation 3.
